name: Crime District
description:
In this crime ridden City, kidnapping, extortion, bomb attacks and hostage taking seem to be the favorite activities of criminals living here,

And the police and special police who are busy maintaining law and order will not wait to die.
You will control a police officer to fight alone, or lead a few team-mates to deal with these stubborn criminals, and complete different tasks in a variety of locations, such as rescuing hostages, defusing bombs and so on.After reaching the corresponding score or goal, you can enter a new level.

Skillfully operating guns and using "bullet time" to send these scum to prison or hell.
